ygData.subject: Re: So you want a robe from Neriak
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Thanks! I will try this either later today (after work) or tomorrow! Another boat trip... :-( //Shulinar, lvl 13 wizard, Rodcet Nife -- Disclaimer: Any
ygData.messageBody:
On 30 Jul, mstokes wrote:
> From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
> I just recieved a work around for the no drop/no trade problem with
> wizard robes. It goes something like this. Have your Dark Elf buddy
> buy a robe at his guild. Group up and find a low level mob. Give the
> robe to the mob, and then kill it. Whoever wants the robe, loots the
> body. Good luck and enjoy your new dark red bathrobe.


Thanks!
I will try this either later today (after work) or tomorrow!
Another boat trip... :-(

//Shulinar, lvl 13 wizard, Rodcet Nife
